Join the FSF

The Free Software Foundation (FSF) is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization based in Boston, MA, USA. We rely on individuals like you to support the FSF's mission to preserve, protect and promote the freedom to use, study, copy, modify and redistribute computer software, and to defend the rights of free software users.

Learn more about the benefits of membership.

Join us!
